rows.label: qst202510_msg0001
rows.name: Onii-chan!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0002
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0003
rows.name:
You're all done with your job here
now, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0004
rows.name:
I guess so...we reported what we
came here to report.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0005
rows.name: Take me to the Land of Mors, then!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0006
rows.name: Not a chance.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0007
rows.name:
Why not? You're free to go where
you want now, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0008
rows.name:
Like hell we're gonna take you to
a dangerous place like that!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0009
rows.name:
I thought you already gave up
on that idea after my old man
told you no, anyway?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0010
rows.name: "Gave up" is such a strong word.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0011
rows.name:
I asked him to let me travel all of
Alst, and he said yes to that!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0012
rows.name:
So naturally that means I can go to
the Land of Mors now, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0013
rows.name: That's some pretty strained logic.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0014
rows.name:
You're pretty cunning for such
a little lass.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0015
rows.name: Very promising young mind.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0016
rows.name:
Come on, you know you want to!
Take me to the Land of Mors!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0017
rows.name:
I ain't budging!
You can come up with all the silly
loopholes you like, no still means no!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0018
rows.name:
Ughhh...you're so useless!
You stubborn prodigal old man!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0019
rows.name:
Prodigal old...?! That's pretty rich,
coming from the likes of you!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0020
rows.name:
Why do you want to go to
Mors so bad, anyway?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0021
rows.name:
It's not exactly what I'd call
a fun place to visit.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0022
rows.name:
You just don't appreciate it properly.
Just to glimpse its landscape would be
an immensely valuable experience!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0023
rows.name:
And besides, it's a treasure trove of
potential discoveries! So many things
you'd never find anywhere else!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0024
rows.name:
Initially, I just wanted to see the place,
but as it turns out...there's something
I really want to find there.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0025
rows.name:
You don't understand what you're
talking about!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0026
rows.name:
The place is crawling with dangerous
monsters, you realize that?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0027
rows.name:
You're a kid without even a Blade to
defend yourself. They'd gobble you up
in two seconds flat.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0028
rows.name:
How're you planning to search for
anything in a place like that?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0029
rows.name: Then send KOS-MOS Re: to protect me.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0030
rows.name:
With her around, I'd be totally safe.
Wouldn't I?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0031
rows.name:
Where do you get off demanding
stuff like that?!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0032
rows.name:
The King told you to protect me,
didn't he?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0033
rows.name:
Sure, but he didn't tell us to
indulge your crazy ideas!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0034
rows.name:
I'm going whether you like it or not!
You can't stop me, Uncle!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0035
rows.name: Not happening. End of story!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0036
rows.name:
Hey, what do you think, KOS-MOS Re:?
You'll come with me, won't you?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0037
rows.name:
I will obey whatever orders
I am given.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0038
rows.name: See? KOS-MOS Re: says she doesn't mind!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0039
rows.name:
However, my first duty is to
protect my master.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0040
rows.name:
Protecting you would necessarily
be a lower-priority task.
Is that acceptable?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0041
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0042
rows.name: There, you see?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0043
rows.name:
You're not KOS-MOS Re:'s Driver, so you
don't get to drag her around wherever!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0044
rows.name:
Now quit being a stubborn little brat,
and hurry on home to Luxuria!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0045
rows.name: Y-you're wrong, all right?!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0046
rows.name:
I may not be her Driver, but
KOS-MOS Re: is my friend!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0047
rows.name:
KOS-MOS Re: will protect me!
I know she will!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0048
rows.name: Give it a rest already!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0049
rows.name: It's like watching two children fight...

rows.label: qst202510_msg0050
rows.name:
Listen, Zeke, there's no point
standing around arguing.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0051
rows.name:
It seems pretty clear Astelle isn't
going to back down any time soon.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0052
rows.name:
Why don't we just give her a quick
look at the Land of Mors and then
bring her straight back?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0053
rows.name:
Seriously? I can't drag you guys all
the way down there just to indulge
the whims of some stubborn little girl...

rows.label: qst202510_msg0054
rows.name:
It's not so much trouble. We owe
His Majesty a favor, anyway.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0055
rows.name:
But Astelle, if things look even the
slightest bit dangerous, we're taking
you straight out of there. Got that?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0056
rows.name: Sounds fine by me!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0057
rows.name: Shall we get going, then, KOS-MOS Re:?
